title: Sarah Vaughan - Eight Classic Albums - 4CD-BOX 2012
description:
Sarah Vaughan, also known as 'Sassy', had her debut studio album release in 1944.
She received the NEA Jazz Masters Award in 1989, which is the highest honor in jazz,
from the National Endowment for the Arts.
Her career spanned from 1942 - 1989, she passed away in April 1990.

This set includes eight early albums - 89 tracks.

- - -

Sarah Vaughan - Eight Classic Albums 1953-1960
(4CD Rock Melon 2012)

1. Hot Jazz - 1953 (3rd album)
2. The Devine Sarah Sings - 1954 (4th album)
3. Sarah Vaughan with Clifford Brown - 1954 (5th album)
4. In The Land Of HiFi - 1955 (6th album)
5. Swingin' Easy - 1957 (9th album)
6. Sarah Vaughan Sings George Gershwin Volume 1 & 2 - 1957 (11 album)
7. Sarah Vaughan And Billy Eckstine - Best Of Irving Berlin - 1957 (10th album)
8. Close To You - 1960 (15th album

These remastered recording have excellent sound.
As with other titles in this series, there's no liner notes, just the tracks listing and album dates.
